nodes.text: Vinros was a Human male Deflarian henchman who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Circa 1 ABY, the Deflarians hijacked a ship piloted by Captain Donovan of the CorSec in order to stole its cargo of weapons. They also captured Donovan and imprisoned him in the Deflarian bunker. CorSec Inspector Cora therefore hired a spacer to investigate the situation. The spacer managed to find the location of the bunker, infiltrated the building and found the imprisoned Captain Donovan. The spacer eventually killed Vinros, several Deflarian henchmen and a Deflarian underboss to liberate Donovan.

Vinros was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Vinros was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006.
